message: I'm excited to sell this product to you, Bob! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a high-quality item at a fair price. I'm willing to offer it to you for $100.
Thanks for the offer, Alice, but I'm hoping to get a better deal. I'm willing to pay $90 for the product.

I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob, but I have to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make at least $110 to make it worth my while. I'm counteroffering at $105.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $105 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with.  How about we split the difference and settle on $100?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $110. I'm willing to compromise a bit, but I need to make a decent profit on this sale. I'm counteroffering at $108.
Alice, I'm happy to continue negotiating, but I'm still aiming for a price closer to $100.  Would you consider $105 as a final compromise? I really do want to buy this product from you.
I appreciate your enthusiasm, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $110. I'm willing to meet you at $107, but I think that's as low as I can go. I'm willing to make a deal at that price.
